targets.query: SELECT last("total_avail_bytes") / last("total_bytes") FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("num_osd") - last("num_osd_in") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("num_osd") - last("num_osd_up") FROM "ceph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_bytes") FROM "ceph_usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)
